rationale: The dashboard has specialized controls (Lock layout, Reset layout, Drag handle) that may not be immediately obvious to new users. While there's a 'Drag widgets to rearrange' hint, other controls lack explanatory context.
problemSolved: The Lock/Unlock button has a title attribute but it only says 'Lock layout' or 'Unlock layout'. The Reset Layout button has title='Reset to default layout'. There's no explanation of what locking does or when users might want to reset.
